reviews.review: Counter-Strike: Source is an online game. In it, you can play as both terrorists and special forces. There are a large number of weapons and everyone will find a weapon to their liking. The Internet has most of the plugins and scripts that can make the game more interesting. You can also create your own servers. In some maps, you need to defuse or plant a bomb in a certain place, in some release the hostages, or just kill all the opponents. In the game, you can find friends and join clans that will compete with each other in the future. With all this, there are drawbacks: it takes a lot of time, is very addictive, can play with your psyche =). Overall, the game is good to kill time.
